name: Yaoyotl
description:
Yaoyotl is a 3rd person 3D Aztec god boss rush where the player plays as an Aztec warrior fighting different gods in different arenas. The player will need quick reactions and a vigilant eye to properly manage their shifting surroundings and deal with the gods' terrifying attacks.

* Controller required

Yaoyotl was developed by a team of 4 during Vancouver Film School's Team Project class. We had 2 months to develop the game.

Ashlyn Ropers-Huilman - Project Manager
Kio Ohene-Djan - Level Design, Combat Script and Project Manager
Murilo Jones - 3D Modeling and Texturing
Guillermo Garduño - Programming and VFX

UI
By Shayna Nuñez
https://www.shaynunez.com

Gameplay and Menu Music by Saúl Ramos
https://www.instagram.com/musicby.sr/
